Method Detail

sfDeploy

public void sfDeploy()
              throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                     java.rmi.RemoteException
Called after instantiation for deployment purposes. Heart monitor is started and if there is a parent the deployed component is added to the heartbeat. Subclasses can override to provide additional deployment behavior.

Specified by:
sfDeploy in interface org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Prim
Overrides:
sfDeploy in class org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.PrimImpl
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - error while deploying
java.rmi.RemoteException - In case of network/rmi error

sfStart

public void sfStart()
             throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                    java.rmi.RemoteException
Can be called to start components. Subclasses should override to provide functionality Do not block in this call, but spawn off any main loops!

Specified by:
sfStart in interface org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Prim
Overrides:
sfStart in class org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.PrimImpl
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - failure while starting
java.rmi.RemoteException - In case of network/rmi error

sfTerminateWith

public void sfTerminateWith(org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.TerminationRecord status)
Provides hook for subclasses to implement useful termination behavior. Deregisters component from local process compound (if ever registered)

Overrides:
sfTerminateWith in class org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.PrimImpl
Parameters:
status - termination status
